attributes.action: Build new ringroads around Glasgow, Telford, Manchester and Northampton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Other than Manchester these cities don't have any ringroads now, and Manchester's is overcrowded, as are our motorways generally, so please greatly expand the motorway network. Our infrastructure is decrepit. If these motorways were built by British prisoners using British concrete and British asphalt, our prisoners would learn to work for the civilised society, and our economy would be stimulated. We'd also spend less time and petrol while waiting in the traffic jams that now exist.
